item.title: Need help please! [project insanity] :O
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“NathanielBacon, post:8, topic:355245”]Guys im still really confused, could you be more detailed on what lines i need to change? or do if i erase the // do i have to replace it with spaces?[/quote]Java is not sensitive to spaces or tabs, or any type of white space. (Except in Strings) So you don’t need to replace it. Just erase the //.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help please! [project insanity] :O
item.dc:creator: @NathanielBacon NathanielBacon
item.description:
@NathanielBacon wrote:

I’m new to coding and i don’t understand what people mean when they say i have to uncomment the npc’s in the entitydef file. The source and client is project insanity and the godwars npc’s are all messed up (bandos is addy ore or something). How do i uncomment the npc’s? For example kree in entitydef looks like this…

if(i == 2558) { // NPC ID
//aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = streamIndices[630];
//entityDef.readValues(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); // Collect original NPC data
entityDef.actions = new String[5];
entityDef.actions[1] = “Attack”;
entityDef.aByte68 = 5;
entityDef.models = new int[3]; // Number of models the NPC uses
int changedColors = 1; // Number of model colors changed on the NPC
entityDef.originalModelColors = new int[changedColors];
entityDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[changedColors];
entityDef.originalModelColors[0] = 61; // Original model color
entityDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 926; // Changed model color
entityDef.models[0] = 28002;
entityDef.models[1] = 28003;
entityDef.models[2] = 28004;
entityDef.anInt91 = 128; //width?
entityDef.anInt86 = 110; //height?
entityDef.name = “Kree’arra”; // NPC name
entityDef.combatLevel = 650; //combat level
entityDef.walkAnim = 3500;
entityDef.standAnim = 3501;
entityDef.description = “The mighty lord Armadyls general kree’arra!”.getBytes(); // NPC description
}

What do i change???

Read full topic
